name: Townsfolk
ability: You have the ability of an official Townsfolk that is not on this script. The Storyteller will tell you which one.
firstNightReminder: If needed, the Townsfolk takes their turn tonight.
otherNightReminder: If needed, the Townsfolk takes their turn tonight.

name: Outsider
ability: You have the ability of an official Outsider that is not on this script. The Storyteller will tell you which one if you would know this.
firstNightReminder: If needed, the Outsider takes their turn tonight.
otherNightReminder: If needed, the Outsider takes their turn tonight.

firstNightReminder: If needed, the Minion takes their turn tonight.
otherNightReminder: If needed, the Minion takes their turn tonight.

name: Demon

firstNightReminder: If needed, the Demon takes their turn tonight.
otherNightReminder: If needed, the Demon takes their turn tonight.

name: Plus One
ability: During game setup, there can only be one "Plus 1" character in play. All official jinxes apply. When providing information, the Storyteller will specify the character ability of the "Plus 1". When a player must choose a character and they choose a "Plus 1", they only choose the "Plus 1" character, not the ability. If the "Plus 1" character requires another character to be in play in setup, that character is also added as a "Plus 1".

name: Alejo Rule
ability: On the first night, the Snake Charmer, Philosopher, and any other characters with the Snake Charmer ability act before Minion and Demon Info. Minion and Demon Info is determined by the Demon after their night actions.
